testimonials.author: John Marshall
testimonials.title: Previous Owner, Nectar Beverages
testimonials.quote: Working with Icraft was an excellent experience they have taken a daunting process for any business owner and made it easy and streamline. Josh was very understanding and patient with us. It was great that we had a test website to see the progress as it came together. The website has been live for a year now increasing our sales considerably and at any moment I know I could call icraft and they will be happy to help.

testimonials.author: Geoff Smith
testimonials.title: Owner, Certified Welding
testimonials.quote: ICRAFT is really great to work with, Josh designed our company's website from the ground up and we are over the moon with how it turned out! Thanks again.
